title: (Wed Full Show) Lunchbox Spills The Tea On Abby About Her Love Life So Abby Spills The Tea On Something Sketchy Lunchbox Is Doing + Bobby's Facebook Issue + Amy's Daughter's Halloween Costume and Scary Movie Compromise
itunes:title: (Wed Full Show) Lunchbox Spills The Tea On Abby About Her Love Life So Abby Spills The Tea On Something Sketchy Lunchbox Is Doing + Bobby's Facebook Issue + Amy's Daughter's Halloween Costume and Scary Movie Compromise
description:
Lunchbox 'spills the tea' on Abby about a man she met while they were in Las Vegas recently! Hear how she met this guy and where they stand now... To get even, Abby 'spills the tea' on Lunchbox about something sketchy he's doing. Two people have reported Lunchbox for what he's doing, so Bobby wants to make sure people know he has nothing to do with it. Plus, Bobby is having issues with his old Facebook posting things he doesn't want to be posted. Then, Amy offered her daughter a compromise with her Halloween costume and wanting to see 'Terrifier 2.' Find out if they have come to an agreement over their Halloween/movie drama yet.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
